argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | deg1sclle.d | |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | deg1sclle.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 3 |  | deg1sclle.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | deg1sclle.a | |- A = ( algSc ` P ) |
| 5 | 2, 4, 3 | #P_ply1sclid | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. K ) -> F = ( ( coe1 ` ( A ` F ) ) ` 0 ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. K ) -> ( A ` F ) = ( A ` ( ( coe1 ` ( A ` F ) ) ` 0 ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 8 | 2, 4, 3, 7 | #P_ply1sclcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. K ) -> ( A ` F ) e. ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 7, 4 | #P_deg1le0 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( A ` F ) e. ( Base ` P ) ) -> ( ( D ` ( A ` F ) ) <_ 0 <-> ( A ` F ) = ( A ` ( ( coe1 ` ( A ` F ) ) ` 0 ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. K ) -> ( ( D ` ( A ` F ) ) <_ 0 <-> ( A ` F ) = ( A ` ( ( coe1 ` ( A ` F ) ) ` 0 ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. K ) -> ( D ` ( A ` F ) ) <_ 0 ) |
